name: Antlers WiFi 08 (3-25-2011)
description: Antlers WiFi is a series of 24 GIFs Rick Silva made in 2011. Each work overlays looping, geometric 3D animations onto photos that the artist took hiking throughout the U.S. and Canada. Antlers WiFi was the first project that combined Rick’s signature landscape-based video art with the blog-art he pioneered throughout the 2000s via his Net Art personas. Antlers WiFi was also Rick’s first major project using 3D animation, which has since become his medium of choice. http://antlerswifi.com
